item.title: Richard Sever
item.description: @steveroyle @albertcardona It's surprisingly difficult to verify identity of people outside well-known US/UK traditional academic institutions. For me this is the big challenge in sci-comm, as while we may be fighting an unwinnable battle in data verification at point of publication, we can at least hold authors accountable in perpetuity if it's later shown to be flawed/fraud - but only if we can verify they are who they claim. 1/2
